translation.en: [man] It's a brave new world, isn't it?
Within a decade, we could be reviving extinct species.
translation.ja: マンモスや剣歯虎など絶滅種の復活も

translation.en: The thylacline, the woolly mammoth, saber-toothed cats.
translation.ja: ここ10年のうちに可能になる

translation.en: Looks like Steven Spielberg's gonna get his park after all.
translation.ja: 「ジュラシック･パーク」も夢じゃない

translation.en: -[quiet laughter] -Well, at least the... Ice Age version.
translation.ja: ジュラ紀でなく氷河期ですが

translation.en: I think you've had to listen to me for long enough. To sum it up,
translation.ja: そろそろまとめに入りましょう

translation.en: No matter what your politics are,
translation.ja: どんな政治信条の人でも―

translation.en: we know that climate change is causing glacial deterioration.
translation.ja: 気候変動で氷河が融解していると認めるはず

translation.en: We also know that there are viruses and bacterias trapped in that now-melting ice.
translation.ja: ウイルスやバクテリアが氷河から溶け出る危険性も

translation.en: a prehistoric equivalent of the Zika virus, Ebola, or the bubonic plague
translation.ja: 現代のエボラウイルスほど強力な先史のウイルスが―

translation.en: were to appear as a result of the melt.
Our bodies would have no immunity.
And we would have no vaccines that could help us.
translation.ja: ワクチンも存在しません ワクチンも存在しません 〝国際感染症サミット〞

translation.en: I don't think it's going to be asteroids or nuclear war that wipes us out.
translation.ja: 人類を滅ぼすのは隕石でも核戦争でもない

translation.en: Ancient forms of these pathogens could start a pandemic
translation.ja: 古代の病原体が世界的流行を起こすかも

translation.en: that makes the bubonic plague look like-- like a chicken pox party.
translation.ja: 腺ペストなど比にならないほどに

translation.en: This isn't nature crying out for help.
translation.ja: 自然は助けを求めてない

translation.en: And that is why I'm calling on you,
translation.ja: あなた方に力を貸してほしい
世界的な科学コミュニティの一員である あなたに

translation.en: to come together and pool your resources and knowledge to get ahead of this.
translation.ja: 世界的な科学コミュニティの一員である あなたに 力を結集させましょう

translation.en: Science has no borders, no agenda,
translation.ja: 科学には国境も派閥もない

translation.en: And the data tells us that this is inevitable.
Listening to you talk about mass extinction really gets me goin'.
translation.ja: 大量絶滅の話をするあなたはセクシーだった

translation.en: Um... I'm sorry. I'm a... married man.
translation.ja: 光栄だが 妻子がいる

translation.en: I apologize for the interruption, Dr. Swann.
translation.ja: スワン先生お楽しみのところ失礼

translation.en: Dr. Lansing is a colleague -from the Arctic Science Exchange. -Oh.
translation.ja: 北極研究で一緒になったランシング先生だ
久しぶり おめでとう

translation.en: It's probably terrible timing, but, um...
translation.ja: 記念日に申し訳ないが

translation.en: we lost contact with Dr. Vercernis at the Arctic Research Station three days ago.
translation.ja: 北極研究所のベカニス先生と３日 連絡が取れない

translation.en: Oh, well, the weather regularly knocks out communications there.
translation.ja: 北極は天候不良で音信不通になりやすい

translation.en: -I'm... I'm sure he's okay. -Yes, you're probably right.
translation.ja: 北極は天候不良で音信不通になりやすい ああ そうだな

translation.en: The thing is, last we heard from him, he'd found something, and he was pretty excited.
translation.ja: だが彼は最後の通信で何かを発見して喜んでた

translation.en: He wanted to talk to you about it.
translation.ja: あなたに知らせたいと

translation.en: Needless to say, we're all anxious to get some updates.
translation.ja: できれば至急 確認したい

translation.en: -Well, I can't. I mean-- -It... It's fine.
translation.ja: 今日だけは… 大丈夫　行って

translation.en: We can celebrate our anniversary any time.
translation.ja: お祝いは いつでもいい

translation.en: I can arrange transport. I got a guy.
-♪ Watch it burn, watch it burn ♪ -[phone rings]

translation.ja: よう　どうした親友？
よう　どうした親友？ マイケル 忙しいか？

translation.en: No, not in the slightest. Why? You all right?
translation.ja: 暇だよ　何かあった？

translation.en: Okay, good, good. Yeah, I need your help. How fast can you get here?
translation.ja: 頼みがある　来てくれるか？

translation.en: Damn, Luther, you need to get a research station somewhere warmer, like the Caribbean or some shit.
translation.ja: 次に研究所を作るならカリブ海にしろ

translation.en: You should be here in the winter! This is only 30 below, Mike.
translation.ja: 冬よりマシだ今は たったのマイナス30度

translation.en: [Michael] Oh, shit. What happened to this place?
-How many people you say live up here? -Two.

translation.ja: ベカニス先生と助手だ

translation.en: Well, there's no one here now.
Luther, take a look at this.
-What? What is it? -No, no, no, no. Step back. Step back.
translation.ja: 何だ？ ダメだ　近寄るな

translation.en: Some kind of biomass. Something he found.
translation.ja: 何らかの生物資源かも

translation.en: Let's get the hell outta here, man.
We gotta call this in, Mike.

translation.ja: やあ 先生 調子は？

translation.en: We've transported the biomass and a skull fragment to your lab for further testing.
translation.ja: 検査のため生物資源と頭蓋骨は運び込んだ

translation.en: Any results for any of the tests?
What about the mycology reports I requested?
translation.ja: 頼んでいた真菌検査は？

translation.en: What about Vercernis? Um... Did the search team find anything?
translation.ja: ベカニス先生の消息は？何か見つけた？

translation.en: There's no sign of him or Ava.

translation.ja: 申し訳ない　ルーサー

translation.en: [sighs] I'm sorry I got you into this, Mikey.
translation.ja: 巻き込んで すまない

translation.en: Yeah, you should be, Luther. This fuckin' blows, man.
translation.ja: ああ 大いに反省してくれ

translation.en: But, hey, we're family, right? Together, always.
translation.ja: でも親友は苦楽をともにするもんだ

translation.en: We are gonna be okay, right?
Yeah, we're gonna be all right, Mike.
[man on PA] Dr. Swann, your family's here.
Are you okay? When are you guys gonna be coming home?
Well, when we start to feel better.
-We'll be fine, buddy. -Yeah. Have I ever let anything happen to your dad?
translation.ja: 俺は いつもルーサーを守ってきた
うん 今回も平気だ

translation.en: [boy] I don't have any, Uncle Mike.
-One more and that's "jackass" for you. -Fuck you!
translation.ja: あと１回で負けだ いつもは僕が勝つのに

translation.en: -I always used to win at this game! -Huh.
translation.ja: いつもは僕が勝つのに

translation.en: Doesn't this taste... off to you?
Just as shitty as the last time.
I will give you one guess about today's news.
translation.ja: いい知らせがある　当てて

translation.en: Wait, Emil, we don't know why we're not shedding the virus yet.
translation.ja: まだウイルスを排出できてない
症状は なくなった

translation.en: There is a huge lack of results.
translation.ja: 何も判明してないんだ

translation.en: Yes, there's a lack of results because no one put it on record.
translation.ja: 有史以前の病気だから分からないだけだ

translation.en: But now it is. It's a harmless Ice Age-era cold.
translation.ja: でも検査は済んだただの古代の風邪だよ

translation.en: Pack your things. Go to your family.
translation.ja: 早く家族を安心させろ

translation.en: Well, you don't have to tell me twice.
[chuckles] You heard the man, Luther. Let's get the fuck outta here.
translation.ja: 許可が出たんだ 早く帰ろう

translation.en: Mrs. Swann, are you trying to seduce me?
Oh, it's, um... [chuckles] ...it's actually Dr. Swann.
translation.ja: 医者としての質問だよ
感染するかもしれない

translation.en: Mrs. Swann... ahem, as a doctor,
I must advise you that any sexual contact, um... -carries with it inherent risks. -Mm.
translation.ja: あらゆる性行為には本質的に危険が伴う

translation.en: [announcer] Police are saying little about this latest killing.
translation.ja: 警察は多くを語りません

translation.en: The victim, a 33-year-old female, was pronounced dead on the scene in downtown Seneca.
translation.ja: セネカ市内で亡くなったのは33歳の女性です

translation.en: Authorities acknowledge possible links to two previous deaths, including Tom Vencilitas,
translation.ja: 他２件の殺害事件との関連が疑われています

translation.en: whose family members are demanding police be more forthcoming
translation.ja: 遺族は警察に情報公開を求め―

translation.en: about the brutal nature of these killings,
stating the public need to know the extent of the danger that they may be in.
translation.ja: 警戒を呼びかけるべきと訴えています

translation.en: Oh, Jesus, Michael. Why would you leave your door open like that?
translation.ja: なぜドアを開けっ放しにしたの？

translation.en: You dropped me for another job.
translation.ja: また 仕事で私を放ったらかした
違う　隔離されてた

translation.en: Mm. Well, that's a new one.
Yeah, I wish I was lying, but it's actually true.
That's why I told you on the phone... I'm gonna make it up to you.
translation.ja: だから埋め合わせると電話で話しただろ

translation.en: You like to talk, don't you, Michael?
translation.ja: 何があったか話したい？
マイケル 聞いてる？

translation.en: I said are you taking me to dinner?
Well, we gotta go. I have an open house in the morning.
[Luther] Why am I not getting anywhere with you?
If that thing talks back, I am so out of here.
I thought these samples would be swimming with pathogens.
translation.ja: 病原体まみれと期待したが

translation.en: I can't even find a virus or a bacteria.
translation.ja: ウイルスの一つもない

translation.en: Amino fluorescence test came back negative too.
At least I'm starting to feel more like myself. Fayne said he's never felt better.
translation.ja: 僕も回復したしマイケルは絶好調だそうだ

translation.en: [man on TV] Police discourage talk of a serial killer despite this latest body
translation.ja: 犯行手口は酷似していますが

translation.en: and certain rumored similarities between the crime scenes of the various victims.
translation.ja: 警察は何の手がかりも得ていません

translation.en: At a news conference this afternoon,
translation.ja: セネカのマッカレーン署長は セネカのマッカレーン署長は〝連続殺人鬼？〞

translation.en: Seneca Police Chief Paul MacErlane appealed to anyone
translation.ja: セネカのマッカレーン署長は〝連続殺人鬼？〞

translation.en: who may have any information about this latest death to come forward to police.
translation.ja: この事件の情報提供者を求めています
防犯カメラの映像を調べたものの―

translation.en: [echoing] ...have combed through hours of surveillance video...
translation.ja: 防犯カメラの映像を調べたものの― 何も発見されていません
何も発見されていません

translation.en: So the veggies, chips, and dip are a really great option
translation.ja: 野菜スティックは前菜にオススメです

translation.en: if you're looking for something a little bit lighter.
translation.ja: 野菜スティックは前菜にオススメです 〝デュラハム〞 野菜スティックは前菜にオススメです

translation.en: Come on up, Les. Apartment ten.
Whoa, whoa, whoa! We haven't finished yet.
I'll make it up to you.
When? When will you make it up to me?
In the near future. Don't bitch about this. It's my living.
translation.ja: 文句言わないで仕事なんだから
レス　ジャーゲンよ
ジャーゲンはインターンレスは盗人
ジャーゲンはインターンレスは盗人 警官だ

translation.en: This better be good, Les. You really screwed the mood around here.
translation.ja: いいネタを持ってきた？

translation.en: Raw footage on the new kill.
[woman] What the fuck happened to her neck?
Put this up right away, Jer-gen. Top of the landing page.
translation.ja: ジャーゲン今すぐアップロード

translation.en: I saw my guy, Dr. Mackie, last week.
Thought it was an infection, but he couldn't find anything.
Weird stuff's been happening in my head.
I was sitting here at the bar the other night.
translation.ja: この前 バーに行った

translation.en: I had two drinks, that's it.
And all of a sudden, I'm... I'm hearing everyone's conversations.
translation.ja: だが急に みんなの会話が聞き取れた

translation.en: Maybe you were just a little...
No. I'm talking about people across the room.
translation.ja: 遠く離れた人の会話もだ

translation.en: And I could read a menu 40 feet away.
I'm not exactly sure that's possible.
No, no, if you were delusional, you would think it was real. But...
translation.ja: 妄想性障害なら自分を疑わない

translation.en: But I do know there's something wrong with me.
Well, we'll... we'll run some tests, for sure.
I'm sure it's nothing to worry about.
That's what I say to you whenever there's a lot to worry about.
translation.ja: 俺なら不安な時ほどそう言う

translation.en: You know this is illegal, right?
The coroner's department's paid for by taxpayer dollars.
translation.ja: 検視は税金で行われてる

translation.en: They've no right to withhold information about a series of vicious murders.
translation.ja: 連続殺人の情報を隠すのは許せない
〝アクセス許可〞 〝アクセス許可〞 ビンゴ

translation.en: Get me every autopsy on the killer's victims.
translation.ja: 殺人の検視結果 全部を

translation.en: Not much blood left in them.
Might have something to do with being torn apart.
translation.ja: 切り裂かれたせいかな

translation.en: According to this, there was less than there should be.
None of these victims have more than two.
And the blood found at the murder scene doesn't account for what's missing.
translation.ja: 現場に残った血はもっと少ない

translation.en: [assistant] So, the electron test results came back.
second batch was negative, and Fayne's sample was inconclusive.
translation.ja: 第１バッチも第２も陰性 マイケルのは不明

translation.en: Yeah, I know. It's time to send it offshore.
translation.ja: ああ 外部に頼もう

translation.en: have them run a PMCA. For prions.
translation.ja: ＰＭＣＡ法でプリオンを調べて

translation.en: It's all checking out clean. We're down to long shots.
translation.ja: あとは低い可能性を試すしかない
寄生虫 菌類 プリオン

translation.en: Proteins that cause really bad shit like mad cow.
translation.ja: 狂牛病などを起こすタンパク質だ
珍しいが感染力が強い

translation.en: Boy, you sure know how to talk to a girl.
translation.ja: 女を口説くのが上手ね

translation.en: how about we all drive over to Emilio's and get a pizza?
translation.ja: デズと一緒にピザ屋に行かない？

translation.en: I thought I was going to get a much different offer.
[laughs] I haven't told you what we could do for dessert.
Hey. [gasping] I need your help, buddy.
translation.ja: ルーサー 助けてくれ

translation.en: I need your help right now.

translation.ja: どうした？ 住所を送るから そこへ
住所を送るから そこへ
分かった　すぐ行く

translation.en: -I don't know how it happened, man. -What are you talking about?
translation.ja: 俺も分からない そもそも誰の家だ？

translation.en: -Michael! What the-- what the fuck? -Luther, I didn't--
translation.ja: おい マイケル 違う

translation.en: You have to believe me! I didn't do this!
I didn't do this. All right? I don't know what happened!
translation.ja: 俺は やってない 本当だ　信じて

translation.en: -Who is she? -I don't know what... I don't...
translation.ja: 誰だ？ 今日 知り合ったバーテンダーだ
今日 知り合ったバーテンダーだ

translation.en: -How'd you get here? What happened? -No, I mean...
-I-- I don't know. -What do you mean you don't know, Mike?
translation.ja: 分からない 分からない？

translation.en: I remember I was having a beer. I'm in the bar talking to her, and she asks me if I could walk her home.
translation.ja: バーで話してて家まで送るよう頼まれた

translation.en: -And then that-- that thing started again. -What thing?
translation.ja: すると 始まった 何が？

translation.en: With my-- with my senses, my hearing, my sight.
translation.ja: 聴覚や視覚の異常だよ

translation.en: [panting] Everything went all crazy, and then...
translation.ja: 全部がおかしくなって―
思い出せない 落ち着け マイケル

translation.en: Sh, sh, sh. You walk her home, right?
translation.ja: 家まで送って 中に招かれ…
家まで送って 中に招かれ… 違う

translation.en: Wait! I-- I remember us getting to her building and then...
translation.ja: この建物の前まで来たのは覚えてる

translation.en: Luther, you know me more than anybody else.
You know that I couldn't do this.
translation.ja: 俺じゃないと分かるだろ？

translation.en: -We gotta call the police. -No! They won't believe me.
translation.ja: 通報する 警察に疑われる

translation.en: -Mike, you didn't do anything! -It's open and shut!
translation.ja: 無実なら… 刑務所に送られ真犯人が逃げる

translation.en: I'll go to prison, and we won't know who did this.
translation.ja: 刑務所に送られ真犯人が逃げる

translation.en: What the fuck are you talking about?

translation.ja: 彼女にはストーカーがいた

translation.en: Yeah, that's-- that's who did this shit. Some guy was threatening her.
translation.ja: 彼女にはストーカーがいた そいつが真犯人だ

translation.en: That's who did this shit. I just need time to find the guy.
translation.ja: そいつが真犯人だ 捜し出す時間が要る

translation.en: -I just need some time to find the guy. -No, Mike. We gotta lawyer up.
translation.ja: ダメだ　弁護士を雇おう

translation.en: When we're ready, sure. I'll do what's right, I promise you. I promise you, but right now, I just need some time.
translation.ja: ストーカーを見つけたらそうするさ

translation.en: -I'm calling the cops. -No, Luther! Listen to me!
translation.ja: 通報する ダメだ　待て

translation.en: -I didn't do this! You know I didn't! -Sh, sh!
translation.ja: 俺じゃない　信じてくれ

translation.en: -I didn't do this! -Mike, stop. Stop, okay?
translation.ja: 俺じゃない　信じてくれ マイケル 落ち着け

translation.en: Okay. Sh. Okay. What do you have in mind?
translation.ja: マイケル どうしたい？

translation.en: Can you help me clean her apartment?
It doesn't work like that, Michael.
No. Forensics are too good now. It's the 21st century.
translation.ja: 現代の鑑識ならすぐ露見する

translation.en: But we could slow them down.
Right? Just to buy me some time to find the guy. Right? Just...
translation.ja: その間にストーカーを見つければいい

translation.en: You're my only hope, man. Please.
Help me, please! You gotta help me. Help me get outta this.
translation.ja: ルーサー 一生のお願いだ

translation.en: I didn't do it. I didn't do it.
translation.ja: 本当に やってない

translation.en: So, what the hell happened last night?
[man] It's just past the tracks up here on the right-hand side.
[Luther] I don't have a choice. I have to go to the police.

translation.ja: 逮捕される かもね

translation.en: But I'm telling them things that they need to know.
translation.ja: だが 知らせないと

translation.en: My God. How could you have done this?
translation.ja: どうして そんな過ちを？

translation.en: I owe the guy my life... a dozen times. At least.
translation.ja: 彼には何度も助けられた無視できない

translation.en: And he's sick, Jess. He's sick.
translation.ja: 今 マイケルは病気なんだ

translation.en: I couldn't just turn my back on him.
But what about Dez? What about me?
Uh-- I know. I-- I know.
Listen... I-- I-- Obviously, there are things I have to make right...
translation.ja: でも過ちを正さないと

translation.en: and I will. I gotta go.
I'll be back in a little bit, okay?
This looks good. Just sign it here.
Uh... My name is Dr. Luther Swann. I'm a research physician at Bremerton.
translation.ja: ブレマートン大学の研究医ルーサー･スワンだ

translation.en: Uh, a friend of mine hurt someone...
and I may have helped cover up the crime.
translation.ja: 隠滅に協力してしまった

translation.en: How bad did he hurt this person?
I think you'd better come with me.
Get your hands in the air!
You know it's obstruction. You'll go for five years, right?
translation.ja: ならば懲役５年もありえる
そんな ありえない

translation.en: That's why it's only five. Sit down!
I wasn't thinking about finding a lawyer. I'm here to help you find Michael Fayne.
translation.ja: マイケルの捜索を手伝いに来ただけだから

translation.en: Trying to kill another woman. We had to shoot him to make him stop.
translation.ja: 別の女性を襲ってたので撃った

translation.en: Didn't bother him much. We talked to him two hours, and he was just fine, thanks. No painkillers.
translation.ja: ２時間 取り調べをしたが痛くも何ともないようだ

translation.en: That he won't talk to us on any substantive level.
translation.ja: 彼は我々に何も話さない

translation.en: How'd they get you here so fast?
Uh, they were motivated... for sure.
translation.ja: 警察が全力で動いてるからね

translation.en: He injured four officers on the way in here. One seriously.
translation.ja: 彼は４人の警官に重軽傷を負わせた

translation.en: I think he was exposed to pathogens that are causing this behavior.
translation.ja: 彼が攻撃的なのは病原体のせいと考えてる

translation.en: I can hear you, you know.
Do you see what I mean? There's something very strange going on with this man.
translation.ja: 彼の体には異変が起きてるんだ

translation.en: But the problem is he's not the only killer.
There's another guy, a dentist who committed suicide.
translation.ja: 自殺した歯科医の男のＤＮＡが―

translation.en: We got his DNA from crime scene three and four.
translation.ja: 第３と４の殺人現場に残ってた

translation.en: The other killer was a dentist?
Fayne saw his dentist last week.
Hey, Mike. What's the name of your dentist?
translation.ja: 担当の歯医者の名前は？

translation.en: I'm telling you, Fayne infected him somehow.
translation.ja: フェインが歯科医を感染させたんだ

translation.en: I need to get in there and talk to him. Alone.
translation.ja: 僕だけで彼と直接 話したい

translation.en: He said he would only talk to me. Let me talk.
translation.ja: 僕としか話さないならそうすべきだ

translation.en: I always thought getting shot would hurt a lot more.
translation.ja: 撃たれたとは思えない
だろ？ 治りがとても早い

translation.en: None of this is making sense.
I mean, the elevated sense of hearing, the sight,
That would require alterations on a cellular level.
translation.ja: 細胞レベルでの変化が起きてる

translation.en: There must've been something on that biomass.
Okay, so then why is none of this shit happening to you?
translation.ja: でも それならお前は？

translation.en: I don't know that yet, Mike.
I mean, maybe it needs a-- a cofactor, I guess.
translation.ja: 発症には特定の因子が必要かもしれないが

translation.en: But something is causing these changes.
translation.ja: 異変が起きてるのは確実だ

translation.en: I did it, Luther. I killed her and the others.
translation.ja: 確かに 俺が殺した

translation.en: -What? No, no, no. Not here. -I think I...
translation.ja: 何だと？ 今は よせ

translation.en: -Blacking out or dreaming. -No. -It's like I can't control it, you know. -Not here. Mikey, stop it.
translation.ja: 急に意識が消えて制御できなくなる

translation.en: -It's like I'm turning into someone else. -Mikey-- In the name of God, please help me.
translation.ja: 別人になるみたいだ助けてくれ

translation.en: Mikey, until you get a lawyer, shut up. They're listening.
translation.ja: 弁護士が来るまで話すな聞かれてる

translation.en: I don't mean help me get out of here. I mean...
How did you say they found you?
I mean, they called me... about an hour and a half ago.
translation.ja: だが１時間半前に警察が電話してきた

translation.en: that new Rover you just bought,
and I was thinking, "Jeez, Luther's already here for me."
translation.ja: 見た時は俺のために来たと思った

translation.en: And then they tased me, and I forgot it.
-Till now. -I am here for you, Michael.
translation.ja: 今まで 助けに来た
違う 否定しても無駄だ

translation.en: Yes. It's not just sight and sound, Luther.
translation.ja: 否定しても無駄だ 五感だけじゃない
取調室１に総員 加勢求む

translation.en: I'm not afraid of you, Mike.
I don't even want cash for this. I want points.
translation.ja: 報酬を上げなきゃ やらない

translation.en: Come on! Two serial killers, one captured, one dead, and new murder photos?
translation.ja: ２人の殺人鬼の情報と新たな現場写真だぞ

translation.en: I call TMZ with that, you lose everything. I give it to you, you break the internet. That's worth 30 points.
translation.ja: 他に売ってもいいが君にとって３割以上の損失だ

translation.en: Only if I get to meet him.
He went batshit in interrogation, super violent. They're sending him to Seneca Psych for secure care.
translation.ja: 取調室で暴れて病院で厳重警備されてる

translation.en: -I know the place. -I can't get you in.
translation.ja: 病院ね 潜入は手伝わないぞ

translation.en: Thirty points, and I'll send you the pics right now.
translation.ja: 利益の３割を約束すれば写真を送る
分かった　金の亡者め

translation.en: Look at these crime scene photos he just sent me of the latest victim.
translation.ja: 見て　最新の殺人現場よ

translation.en: I bet you all her blood is gone... like the others.
translation.ja: また血が消えてるように見える

translation.en: Who knows? It could be true.
I'm right here, man. I'm right here.
translation.ja: 僕が ついてるからな

translation.en: We got the results of PMC testing back.

translation.ja: で？ 未知のプリオンが検出された

translation.en: But these particular prions are unknown.
translation.ja: 未知のプリオンが検出された

translation.en: They've recovered prions from all three samples.
translation.ja: 全サンプルで検出された

translation.en: Biomass, ancient human skull, and a living adult male.
translation.ja: 生物資源 古代人の頭蓋骨そして成人男性

translation.en: Okay. Got a great spot. West parking lot outside the front entrance.
translation.ja: 正面入口の前に駐車できた
コーヒーをもらってる

translation.en: You're breaking into a secure unit to find a serial killer, and you're stopping for coffee?
translation.ja: 殺人鬼に会いに行くのになぜコーヒーを？

translation.en: Completes the look. Somebody pulling something wouldn't stop for a coffee.
translation.ja: 無意味だからこそ怪しくなくなる

translation.en: Luther. Oh, my God. What's going on? Where the hell have you been?
translation.ja: ルーサー どこにいるの？

translation.en: It's bad news about Mike, Jess.
You mean the mad cow thing?
You had that fever too, you know.
I know. I know. We don't know anything yet, Jess.
translation.ja: まだ どうなるか分からない

translation.en: But if the changes in him are caused by prions, this thing could spread.
translation.ja: 本当にプリオンが原因なら伝染する

translation.en: There could be others. A lot of others.
translation.ja: 他にも大勢感染者がいるかも

translation.en: I was around him. So was Dez.
translation.ja: 私もデズもマイケルに会った
身分証を アイリーン･ゼン

translation.en: Listen, he won't stay under, but if we re-medicate this guy, we could kill him.
translation.ja: 鎮静剤を更に打てば死んでしまうぞ

translation.en: Mr. Fayne, I'd like to ask you a few questions.
translation.ja: フェインさん質問があります

translation.en: You don't smell like a doctor.
I want to help you tell your side of the story, Mr. Fayne.
translation.ja: 真実を伝える手伝いをしたい

translation.en: The bullet wounds are almost completely healed, and his hemoglobin's off the scale.
translation.ja: 銃創は ほぼ完治ヘモグロビン値は測定不可能

translation.en: Maybe that ties into the missing blood.
All the victims have been missing a lot of blood. Way more than we can account for at the scenes.
translation.ja: 被害者の出血量が現場の血よりずっと多い

translation.en: Now, if he ingested the victims' blood--
He would be violently ill. Iron overdose, kidney failure...
translation.ja: 鉄中毒や腎不全など重病になる

translation.en: The other killer, the dentist, they found over a liter of blood in his stomach.
translation.ja: 歯科医の胃からは大量の血が検出された

translation.en: Yet he showed no signs of toxicity or dehydration.
translation.ja: だが中毒や脱水症状の形跡がない

translation.en: I don't know who I am...
We need backup. All officers report.
Please tell me I got that.

translation.ja: いいか　徹底的に調べろ

translation.en: -Then check it again, top to bottom. -Detective.
translation.ja: いいか　徹底的に調べろ 刑事さん

translation.en: Just a second. I'll get back to you.
translation.ja: 待ってろ　かけ直す

translation.en: I have to get home to my wife and my kid.
translation.ja: 妻子を迎えに行きたい

translation.en: You're not a free man, Swann.
but you don't know where Fayne is. And he thinks I sold him out. My family is in danger.
translation.ja: フェインは僕を恨んでる家族が危ない

translation.en: I'll see if I can send a patrol car.
No, no, no, no, no. Please, I need to-- to go to them. Let me go get them, please.
translation.ja: ダメだ　僕自身が行って２人を守らないと

translation.en: You saw what he did to your officers. He knows where I live.
translation.ja: 命懸けじゃないと彼からは守れない

translation.en: Two hours. You're one second late...

translation.ja: ありがとうございます

translation.en: Hi, it's Jess. Leave a message.
translation.ja: 留守です　伝言をどうぞ

translation.en: Jess, don't go anywhere. Lock the doors.
translation.ja: ジェス 鍵をかけて家から出るな

translation.en: Call me when you get this. Bye.
Jess didn't pick me up. I think something's following me.
translation.ja: ジェスが来ないし誰かが後ろにいる

translation.en: All right, listen to me, Dez. Go home. Right now. Immediately. Lock the doors.
translation.ja: 急いで家に帰って鍵をしっかりかけろ

translation.en: I'll be there in just a little bit. I'll call 911, okay?
translation.ja: すぐ帰る警察にも通報する

translation.en: There was something following me. I swear.
translation.ja: 本当に追われてたんだ
本当に追われてたんだ 家は安全だ
ジェスは？ 分からない　何事なの？
分からない　何事なの？
